Klasse Calculator

java.lang.Object
control.Calculator
public class Calculator extends Object
The Calculator class provides a method to calculate shipping costs based on the dimensions and weight of a packet.

  • Methodendetails

    • calcShippingCosts

      public double calcShippingCosts(Packet pack)
      Calculates the shipping costs based on the dimensions and weight of the given packet. The shipping costs are determined by the following rules: - If the height is less than or equal to 300mm, the width is less than or equal to 300mm, and the height is less than or equal to 150mm, the cost is 3.89 EUR. - If the height is less than or equal to 600mm, the width is less than or equal to 300mm, and the height is less than or equal to 150mm, the cost is 4.39 EUR. - If the height is less than or equal to 1200mm, the width is less than or equal to 600mm, the height is less than or equal to 600mm, and the weight is less than or equal to 5000g, the cost is 5.99 EUR. - If the weight is between 5001g and 10000g, the cost is 7.99 EUR. - For packets heavier than 10000g, the cost is 14.99 EUR.
      Parameter:
      pack - the packet for which the shipping costs are to be calculated
      Gibt zurück:
      the calculated shipping costs
